General.description: Methanobrevibacter smithii ALI is an anaerobe, mesophilic prokaryote that was isolated from human large intestine.

strain history.history: <- T. L. Miller, New York State Department of Health, Albany, New York, USA; ALI <- T. L. Miller and M. J. Wolin {1980}
